title: The Summoner
description: The enemy may be his only hope. . .Fallen angel Kasdeya hates all mortals. They're little more than playthings, as far as he's concerned. But when he finds himself facing a thousand-year prison sentence, he has no choice but to call on the one woman who might set him the Summoner.His plan is simple. . .seduce her for his own purposes, then throw her away. If only she weren't so argumentative, so intelligent. If only she weren't so damned sexy!77,141 Words
author: Alisha Steele
